high_descs: go forward to the bed and turn right go forward to the desk and turn left
pick up the green pattern pillow on the bed
turn on the light on the desk
anns.task_desc: Turn on the light on the desk

high_descs: Walk to the right and then turn to the left to face the bed.
Pick up the green pillow on the right side of the bed.
Turn to the right and face the table.
Turn on the lamp on the edge of the table.
anns.task_desc: To see the pillow in the light.

high_descs: Cross the room towards the bed, hang a left until you reach the small desk and turn left to face the bed.
Pick up the green pillow from the right side on the bed.
Turn to the right and face the large desk against the wall.
Turn on the small lamp on the left corner of the large desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow by the light of a small lamp.
